faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your questions about AI Avatar Videos

items.title: What can I use AI Avatar Videos for?
items.description: You can use AI Avatar Videos for a variety of purposes, including marketing, education, social media content, and personal projects. The avatars can present information, promote products, or deliver personalized messages.

items.title: Is there a limit to the videos I can create?
items.description: There is no strict limit! Each user can create a set number of videos daily, with options to earn more credits for additional creations.

items.title: Do I need any prior video editing experience?
items.description: No experience is required! Our platform is designed for anyone to create stunning videos effortlessly.

items.title: Can I use my avatar videos commercially?
items.description: Yes, users on paid plans can use their avatar videos for commercial purposes. Free-tier users can create content for personal use.

footer.heading: Ready to Create Your AI Avatar Video?
